snippet: Professional road racers, track specialists, bike messengers and urban cyclists competed in the Red Hook Criterium in Brooklyn, N.Y., last Saturday.
abstract: More than 280 riders participate in Red Hook Criterium in Brooklyn, NY, an cycling event featuring professional road racers, track specialists, bike messengers and urban cyclists competing over multiple laps around a (wet) technical circuit; race involves fast, brakeless, fixed-gear bikes.
lead_paragraph: Professional road racers, track specialists, bike messengers and urban cyclists competed in the Red Hook Criterium in Brooklyn, N.Y., last Saturday.

headline.main: Photos: A Damp Spin Through Brooklyn
